verbose_text: Following the initial observation that CXCL13 is expressed in Helicobacter pylori induced gastric mucosa associated lymphoid structures and the findings of elegant studies showing that transgenic expression of LT or individual lymphoid chemokines in non lymphoid tissues (pancreas, thyroid) leads to formation of lymphoid like structures, the role of lymphoid chemokines in regulating immune cell trafficking and organization of ectopic lymphoid tissue in inflammatory conditions has received increasing attention.
